to detail and accuracy; and good communication skills both oral and written. Operations are
essential if we want to stay ahead of our competitors and ensure future success. We must build
on our strengths, work on our weaknesses, and keep discovering new and better ways of doing
things.

Total Work Experience: 07 years
Company Name: Heba Fire & Safety Equipment Limited Dammam (KSA)
Designation       : Mep project engineer
Duration           : 22 Decomber2015 To till date
Project              : 132/13.8/33KV Switch Gear sub station
System              : FM-200 Clean Agent System, Sprinkler System, Hydrant System
Job & responsibilities:
                        : 1. Fire Alarm (Conventional & Addressable both), Fire Suppression works (FM-
200 & Novec-1230 both) & Fire Sprinkler System (Design Coordination, Quality Control and Site Work).
2. HVAC works (Design Coordination, Quality Control and Site Work).
3. Plumbing works (Design Coordination, Quality Control and Site Work).
4. Material Management 
 5. Planning, Scheduling & Invoicing
6. Quality Control (Well versed with all the below mentioned standards for QA/QC)
(TES,TCS&TMSS->SEC engineering, construction and material standards)
SASO Standards
ISO Standards
Aramco Standards
ROP Standards
7. General Fabrication works.
8. Five Star Safety measures (Authorized Permit Holder in SEC Extra High Voltage Project with approved 
LOA (Limitation of Access)).
Field of Experience
Continue…

Fire Alarm, Suppression and Protection System
• Installation, Testing & commissioning of Fire Suppression (Novec-1230 & FM-200) System with Pneumatic 
Test & Flow Test.
• Pilot Line Installation, Testing and Commissioning with Pneumatic Test for the FM-200 and Novec-1230 
Systems.
• Conduiting and Cabling for the Conventional and Addressable Fire Alarm System.
• Installation, Testing & commissioning of Fire Alarm System with Room Integrity Test.
• Installation of Fire Fighting Sprinkler System with Hydro Test.
• Signal testing in the SAS (Substation Automation System) and SCADA Panels with review of termination 
diagrams.
• Panels testing for the HVAC-DDC & MFACP interlock during the actual fire condition.
• Installation of Fire Extinguisher DCP & CO2 (6kg, 12 kg &50kg) type as per the drawing.
• Fabrication work for the Fire extinguisher sheds (Wall Mounted and wheeled type) as per the SEC standard.
HVAC
 
  
• Installation of all type of HVAC, Ducts & Accessories with Light/ Smoke Test.
•Cabling, conduiting for the related duct accessories, sensors and field devices.
•Installation and control works for the Supply, Exhaust and Smoke Purging Fans and integration with DDC 
panels.
•Fabrication work for the Platform and structure for the smoke purging fans and access doors for the duct 
maintenance and cleaning work.
• Installation, Testing & commissioning of PACU, Chiller System with Air Balancing & Cooling test 
respectively.
Plumbing
• All Plumbing related Pipe line installations with Accessories & Inspections for Drainage, Raw, Hot & Cold 
water lines.
•.Eyewash, Geyser, Toilet accessories Installation as per the IFC drawing and SEC standard.
•Pumps installation (Submrsible, Transformer pit pumps, Booster, Water Transfer) along with float switches 
and Level Indicators.
•Water Storage Tanks Installation as per the SEC standard
•Control works for the all the plumbing pumps and accessories. 
•Hydro test for the Plumbing piping Network.
•Functional test for all the plumbing pumps, Eyeswash, Float switches, Geysers and all other plumbing 
accessories and components.
Overhead Cranes and JIB Cranes
• Installation, Testing & commissioning of EOT Crane & Jib Crane with Load Test.
Continue…

• Related Civil & Electrical works.
Overall Responsibilities & Duties
• Prepare and implement the project program depends upon the targets.
• Preparing Daily, Weekly & Monthly reports for the Clients.
• Able to prepare, review and verify Shop drawings, Material submittals, Method of statements, Schedules and 
project related technical submittals.
•Invoice clearance as per the work completion & progress percentage.
• Ensure that all information related to IFC drawings, mechanical equipment lists, construction equipment lists 
and technical specifications are readily available.
 • Access, forecast and plan for manpower requirements based on targets.
• Procure and store required materials to complete the project in time.
• Reviewing material specification, raising RFI for material inspection, carry out material inspection with 
Client / Consultant etc.
• Supervision of site installation activities related to complete Mechanical scope of the project.
• Oversight of field installation activities including inspection and problem resolution.
• Preparation of QC related documents, raising RFI, carry out inspections with clients / consultant, closing RFI 
etc.
• Maintain and compliance with Quality assurance and control procedures based on pre-established ISO 
standards and International standards.
• Implement Health and Safety plan throughout the site.
• Provide motivation for employees.
• Maintaining customer satisfaction by achieving targets in time.

Continue…

Preparing IR (Inspection Request).
Preparing the MTO (Material take off).
Preparing the measurement sheet.
Attend the technical meeting with contractor or consultant.
Anchor on-site construction activities to ensure completion of project within the time &
cost parameters and effective resource utilization to maximize the output.
Coordinating the project activities and preparing specifications with the Clients   to ensure
drawings are per the specifications of clients.

Plan accordingly.
Develops best practices and maintenance management measures including the review and
update of standards on a routine basis.
Develops and implements a process for periodic inspection and evaluation of judicial
branch facilities. 
Conducts engineering and feasibility and economic studies and prepares reports on findings.
Develops standards for design and technical specifications for judicial branch projects.
Investigates  new  MEP  design  concepts  and  technical  developments  of  systems  for
applicability to engineering problems.

contractors for compliance with the requirements of Federal, State and local agencies
regarding fire, public health and safety.
Reviews contract documents, advises staff inspectors on construction projects; prepares
change orders and request for information responses as required for public safety and
compliance with contract documents. 
Agnice Fire Protection Ltd.
Designation: Site-Engineer.
Duration: 26/August/2006 to 01/April/2013.
           Project: TCS Ahmedabad (Mantri Construction) 
Designation: Site Engineer
Job Responsibilities:
Inspection of Welding at various stages like bevel angle, fit up, root, fill-up and final passes of
welding as per WPS of structural.
Executing the work as per drawing.
Checking the erection done by as per drawing or not.
Preparing method statement, quality plans & checklist.
Preparing IR (Inspection Request) / Preparing MTO (Material Take Off).
Preparing measurement sheet and conducting hydro testing of pipe.
Inspecting the welding joint by DP testing method.
Continue…

Involved in the inspection of raw materials, visual inspection of plates welds by NDT methods and
Carrying out Hydrostatic& Vacuum Tests for Section components.
Receipt Inspection of pre fabricated parts and Maintaining of WPS, PQR and Welder qualification
records.
Carrying out precautions during welding such as preheating and baking of low hydrogen elec
trodes.
Witnessing of all NDT activities being carried out for the finished and semi finished welds.
Resource  Allocation  to  meet  the  schedule,  co-ordinate  with  client  and  various  Third  Party
Inspectors.
Document control like project drawings and all QA/QC documentation.
SISCO ABU DHABI (UAE).
